info.title: Cable API
info.description: This document describes the REST APIs used for Cable application

post.summary: Authenticates a user based on the provided login details
Authenticate a user by their authorization header token
Refreshes the user access and refresh tokens

patch.summary: Changes the password of an existing user
Changes the logged in user password

post.summary: Get all charging points of the application
Get all charging points by user id of the application
post.operationId: Get all charging points by user id

get.summary: Get charging point by id of the application

post.summary: Add charging point of the application

delete.summary: Delete charging point of the application

put.summary: Update charging point of the application
Update charging point location of the application

patch.summary: Update charging point visitors count of the application
Update charging point status of the application

get.summary: Get all charging point types of the application
Get all plug types of the application
Get all statuses of the application
Get All Charging Point Attachments By Id
get.operationId: Get All Charging Point Attachments By Id
